section.64: Military Expeditions led by the Prophet (pbuh) (Al-Maghaazi)

hadiths.text: Narrated Isma`il:I saw (a healed scar of) blow over the hand of Ibn Abi `Aufa who said, "I received that blow in the battle of Hunain in the company of the Prophet." I said, "Did you take part in the battle of Hunain?" He replied, "Yes (and in other battles) before it
